_sText:
This is the de_stargate_sgc map I made in counter-strike source.

This is a stargate map, but made it as a bomb defuse map.
There is 3 different worlds in the map where you can travel with the gate.

I made a radar to the map too.

I made the map myself and basically everything but my cousin Evil Donut was helpful and made the elevator on it and gave a few ideas :P
Thanks for Apollo441 for his Stargate and DHD, their awesome :P

Features:

1. Real Stargate sounds.
2. RT Camera.
3. Working Elevator.
4. Working Iris.
5. Beautiful Working Stargates.
6. 3 Different Worlds.
7. Armoury.
8. MALP and MAT room.
9. Prison.
10. Stargate SGC logo

Video:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EOoJe69QdTQ

PS. There is teleports in the "Grass" world on the statues to go either to terrorist base or to counter-terrorist base without using the stargate.
